alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 8:44PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Sweetwater County through 930 PM MDT... At 843 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms across west central Sweetwater County, in the vicinity of Green River and Rock Springs. These storms were moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up 40 to 50 mph and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rock Springs around 855 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Superior. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 72 and 130. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River
